nodes.excerpt: WeWeb is a no-code website builder that helps you build sites faster thanks to: - A professional editor built around collaboration - Data fetching from any backend/CMS (Airtable, Headless CMSes, REST API) - Importing custom components from GitHub (React / Vue)
nodes.title: WeWeb - No-code site builder that integrates with the tools you love
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

localize.description: WeWeb是一个无需代码的网站建设者，它能帮助你更快地建立网站，这要归功于。- 一个围绕协作而建立的专业编辑器 - 从任何后台/CMS（Airtable，无头CMS，REST API）获取数据 - 从GitHub（React / Vue）导入自定义组件。
localize.tagline: 无需代码的网站建设者，集成了你喜欢的工具。

localize.description: WeWeb是一個無需代碼的網站建設者，它能幫助你更快地建立網站，這要歸功於。- 一個圍繞協作而建立的專業編輯器 - 從任何後臺/CMS（Airtable，無頭CMS，REST API）獲取數據 - 從GitHub（React / Vue）導入自定義組件。
localize.tagline: 無需代碼的網站建設者，集成了你喜歡的工具。

nodes.excerpt: Prefix helps your business get started with RPA without expensive implementation partners. Automate repetitive work on web and desktop apps that don't have API’s or clean software integrations, and save your team valuable time.

nodes.excerpt: This free tool determines if your website follows the 7 key factors and if its complaint with Google's Core Web Vitals. Knowing where your website stands will help you prepare for the upcoming Google Page Experience Update in May!

nodes.excerpt: Fintoc enables developers to initiate bank transfers and pull transactional data from their users' bank accounts. Whether an app wants to automate bank reconciliation or improve its underwriting process, Fintoc is the way to go in Latin America.
nodes.title: Fintoc - An API to connect bank accounts with any app in LATAM
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Fintoc使开发人员能够启动银行转账，并从用户的银行账户中提取交易数据。无论一款应用是想自动进行银行对账还是改善其核销流程，Fintoc都是拉美地区的最佳选择。
localize.tagline: 一个连接银行账户与拉美地区任何应用程序的API。

localize.description: Fintoc使開發人員能夠啓動銀行轉賬，並從用戶的銀行賬戶中提取交易數據。無論一款應用是想自動進行銀行對賬還是改善其核銷流程，Fintoc都是拉美地區的最佳選擇。
localize.tagline: 一個連接銀行賬戶與拉美地區任何應用程序的API。

nodes.excerpt: Get a living snapshot of all your analytics. Just copy and paste a single line of code to your Website or App and, within minutes, all your events will be monitored and automatically added to your tracking plan.

localize.description: 获取您所有分析的动态快照。只需复制并粘贴一行代码到您的网站或应用程序中，在几分钟内，您的所有活动将被监控并自动添加到您的跟踪计划中。

nodes.excerpt: Serverless Invoices is a free tool for invoice generating and management - no signup needed. Truly serverless, your data is safe with you in your browser. Export/import your invoices. It's open source, easy to modify, easy to deploy.
nodes.title: Serverless Invoices - Free, serverless invoice generator - open sourced
nodes.author: Marek

localize.description: Serverless Invoices是一款免费的发票生成和管理工具--无需注册。真正的无服务器，您的数据在您的浏览器中是安全的。导出/导入您的发票。它是开源的，易于修改，易于部署。
localize.tagline: 免费的、无服务器的发票生成器--开源的

nodes.excerpt: Webiny is an open-source framework that helps developers architect, build and deploy applications on top of the serverless infrastructure. Webiny also comes with a serverless CMS that runs on top of AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, and S3.
nodes.title: Webiny 5.0 - Build serverless applications and websites in minutes
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

localize.description: Webiny是一个开源框架，可以帮助开发者在无服务器基础设施之上架构、构建和部署应用。Webiny还附带了一个无服务器CMS，运行在AWS Lambda、DynamoDB和S3之上。
localize.tagline: 在几分钟内构建无服务器应用程序和网站

localize.description: Webiny是一個開源框架，可以幫助開發者在無服務器基礎設施之上架構、構建和部署應用。Webiny還附帶了一個無服務器CMS，運行在AWS Lambda、DynamoDB和S3之上。
localize.tagline: 在幾分鐘內構建無服務器應用程序和網站

nodes.excerpt: Use our collaborative editor to create motion graphics that respond to different states and user inputs. Then load your animations into apps, games, and websites with our open-source runtimes.
nodes.title: Rive - Create and ship interactive animations to any platform
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 使用我们的协作编辑器来创建响应不同状态和用户输入的运动图形。然后利用我们的开源运行时，将您的动画加载到应用程序、游戏和网站中。
localize.tagline: 创建并发送交互式动画到任何平台

localize.description: 使用我們的協作編輯器來創建響應不同狀態和用戶輸入的運動圖形。然後利用我們的開源運行時，將您的動畫加載到應用程序、遊戲和網站中。
localize.tagline: 創建併發送交互式動畫到任何平臺

nodes.excerpt: Formst is a JavaScript library for structuring and validating forms in React. It is based on MobX-State-Tree which makes it simple and performant and it is built on the principles of "UI as an afterthought".
nodes.title: Formst - Model-driven form library for React
nodes.author: Gaurav Guha

localize.description: Formst是一个用于在React中构建和验证表单的JavaScript库。它基于MobX-St-state-Tree，使得它简单且性能良好，它是建立在 "UI作为事后考虑 "的原则上。
localize.tagline: 模型驱动的React表单库

localize.description: Formst是一個用於在React中構建和驗證表單的JavaScript庫。它基於MobX-St-state-Tree，使得它簡單且性能良好，它是建立在 "UI作爲事後考慮 "的原則上。
localize.tagline: 模型驅動的React表單庫
